mapper.select: SELECT c.cart_id, c.cart_user_id, c.cart_product_quantity, c.cart_product_size, p.product_id, p.product_name, p.product_image, p.product_price from ecommerce_cart c, ecommerce_product p where c.cart_user_id = #{user_id} and c.cart_product_id = p.product_id and c.cart_status = 0
mapper.update: update ecommerce_cart set cart_product_quantity = #{product_quantity} where cart_user_id = #{user_id} and cart_id = #{cart_id}
mapper.delete: delete from ecommerce_cart where cart_user_id = #{user_id} and cart_id = #{cart_id}
mapper.update: update ecommerce_cart set cart_status = 1 where cart_user_id = #{user_id} and cart_status = 0
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ecommerce_cart(cart_id, cart_product_quantity, cart_product_id, cart_product_size) VALUES (#{cart_id}, #{cart_product_quantity}, #{cart_product_id}, #{cart_product_size})
